entry.title: PBULICATION
entry.content:
Journal Paper

2020

林融冰, 曾祥方, 宋政宏, 徐善辉, 胡久鹏, 孙天为, & 王宝善. (2020). 分布式光纤声波传感系统在近地表成像中的应用 Ⅱ: 背景噪声成像. 地球物理学报,63 (4), 28.

宋政宏, 曾祥方, 徐善辉, 胡久鹏, 孙天为, & 王宝善. (2020). 分布式光纤声波传感系统在近地表成像中的应用 Ⅰ: 主动源高频面波. 地球物理学报, 63 (2), 532-540.

张丽娜, 任亚玲, 林融冰, 宋政宏, & 曾祥方. (2020). 分布式光纤声波传感器及其在天然地震学研究中的应用. 地球物理学进展, (1), 9.

2019

Zeng, X., & Thurber, C. (2019). Three-dimensional shear wave velocity structure revealed with ambient noise tomography in the Parkfield, California region. Physics of the Earth and Planetary Interiors, 292, 67-75.

Luo, X., Zeng, X., Dong, P., Zhou, Y., Wei, X., & Cheng, H. (2019). The Longnan M_S5. 5 Earthquake on September 12, 2008: A Very Shallow Event Probably Triggered by the Wenchuan Earthquake. Earthquake Research in China,
(3), 3.
Zhang, L., Luo, Y., Chen, Z., Xie, Z., Zhou, L., & Zeng, X. (2019). Surface Wave Group Velocity Tomography Imaging from Ambient Noise for Fujian Province and Its Adjacent Areas. Earthquake Research in China, 33 (1), 52-61.

2018

Wang, H. F., Zeng, X., Miller, D. E., Fratta, D., Feigl, K. L., Thurber, C. H., & Mellors, R. J. (2018). Ground motion response to an ML 4.3 earthquake using co-located distributed acoustic sensing and seismometer arrays. Geophysical Journal International, 213 (3), 2020-2036.

Song, Z., Zeng, X., Thurber, C. H., Wang, H. F., & Fratta, D. (2018). Imaging shallow structure with active-source surface wave signal recorded by distributed acoustic sensing arrays. Earthquake Science, (4), 4.

Zeng, X., & Ni, S. (2018). Finite difference calculation of traveltime on non-orthogonal grid. Earthquake Science, (2), 2.

2017

Zeng, X., Lancelle, C., Thurber, C., Fratta, D., Wang, H., Lord, N., ... & Clarke, A. (2017). Properties of noise cross‐correlation functions obtained from a distributed acoustic sensing array at Garner Valley, California. Bulletin of the Seismological Society of America, 107 (2), 603-610.

2016

Zeng, X., Thurber, C. H., Shelly, D. R., Harrington, R. M., Cochran, E. S., Bennington, N. L., ... & McClement, K. (2016). 3-DP-and S-wave velocity structure and low-frequency earthquake locations in the Parkfield, California region. Geophysical Journal International, 206**(3)**, 1574-1585.

Zeng, X., & Thurber, C. H. (2016). A graphics processing unit implementation for time–frequency phase‐weighted stacking. Seismological Research Letters, 87 (2A), 358-362.

Zeng, X., Wang, H., Lord, N., Alshammari, A., Fratta, D., Coleman, T., & MacLaughlin, M. (2018). Seismic imaging with Distributed Acoustic Sensing in an active room-and-pillar mine. EGUGA, 10971.

2017

Zeng, X., Thurber, C. H., Wang, H. F., & Fratta, D. (2017). 3D shear wave velocity structure revealed with ambient noise tomography on a DAS array. AGUFM, 2017, S33F-06.
